channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Drop support for macOS High Sierra
  • Support French localization
  • Add support for CONTROL (^) + H keybinding which removes the last characer in the search field
  • Add support for CONTROL (^) + U keybinding which clears the search field
  • Add links to website, GitHub and support to the about window
  • Fix a crash when selecting bottom pinned item when visible menu items is limited
